subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Lleyton Hewitt, like Roger Federer, is 32 and was once No. 1 in the world, but he has moved on from those increasingly distant days and found meaning at a new, lower level.
snippet: Lleyton Hewitt, like Roger Federer, is 32 and was once No. 1 in the world, but he has moved on from those increasingly distant days and found meaning at a new, lower level.
